mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TIMETABLE (CLASS_CODE, NAME, TYPE, CREDIT, INSTRUCTOR, LOCATION, TIME, GRADE) VALUES (#{CLASS_CODE}, #{NAME}, #{TYPE}, #{CREDIT}, #{INSTRUCTOR}, #{LOCATION}, #{TIME}, #{GRADE}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE NAME=#{NAME}, TYPE=#{TYPE}, CREDIT=#{CREDIT}, INSTRUCTOR=#{INSTRUCTOR}, LOCATION=#{LOCATION}, TIME=#{TIME}, GRADE=#{GRADE}
